page.title: 06Local Surfing champion
page.content: On the 2nd July 1985 we interviewed Carwyn Williams;this is what we discovered about him.He uses "Sex wax" to put on his Crab Island surf board.He is sponsored by Alder and gets Alder Surfwear free, along with free surf boards. He says thrusters (3 fin boards) make you go faster. We found he wins money,about Â£800, not trophies. He says the best place he's been surfing is Jeffreys Bay in South Africa. We found he has a surf skier for a partner and he says he would like to teach people to surf but has not so far. He is nineteen and has been surfing properly for six years. The best beginners board is the biggest board you can get,but Carwyn has a 5ft.9in board and he has two or three of them . He has won the European Pro-Circuit Championship. By P.France,S. Rees,and C.Stone.
